backend/main.mo: Defines workspace, sales, marketing, portfolio, subscription types and comparison logic, plus access-controlled actor functions for managing business data and generating ads.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration from old workspace structure to a new one by converting sales items and rebuilding the workspace map.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written one-line summaries for numerous frontend files related to routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens for consistent UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up all application routes, authentication flow, and the authenticated layout wrapper using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Messag: Renders selectable business message templates with optional sales item or campaign context and a copy-to-clipboard feature.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save an initial business name.
frontend/src/components/layout/Authentic: Wraps pages in an authenticated layout including a sidebar and scrollable main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageSecti: Shows a page section header with title, optional subtitle, and an optional action element.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Renders the main sidebar with navigation links, user profile display, and login/logout control.
frontend/src/components/portfolios/Portf: Form for creating or editing portfolios, including optional impact portfolio fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/sales/SalesItemD: Dialog for creating or editing sales items with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/sales/SalesItems: Displays sales items in a table with edit and delete actions, including dialogs for both operations.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Renders a badge showing a subscription status with variant and label based on the status value.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Wo: Provides search input and filter buttons for workspace subscription filtering.
Displays a table of workspace subscription details with formatted dates, plans, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/system/QueryStat: Contains loading, error, and empty state UI components for async query handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and mutating workspace data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/adGeneration.ts: Generates ad text variations based on product, audience, tone, and channel templates.
frontend/src/lib/assistantInsights.ts: Analyzes a workspace and subscription status to produce a list of issues with severity, explanations, and checklists. Checks subscription, sales data, portfolios, and marketing campaigns.
frontend/src/lib/messageTemplates.ts: Generates predefined email message templates for sales follow‑up, invoice reminders, and customer winbacks using business and item/campaign data.
frontend/src/lib/subscription.ts: Computes subscription status details such as label, expiration, days remaining, and cancelability based on plan and dates. Provides a typed SubscriptionStatus object.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point rendering the app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers. Bootstraps the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdGeneratorPage.tsx: UI for generating and saving AI ad variations with subscription checks and form inputs for product, audience, tone, and channel. Integrates with workspace data and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantPage.tsx: Displays AI assistant insights by analyzing the workspace and showing issues with severity indicators. Provides navigation and message templates.
frontend/src/pages/CampaignDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed information for a specific marketing campaign including dates and advertisement list. Handles missing data and provides navigation back to campaigns.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard summarizing workspace stats, subscription status, and quick links to major features. Includes hero section and workspace loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity and displays branding with a single sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Loads marketing campaigns, handles loading/error states, and displays campaign cards with links to details.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Shows details for a single portfolio, supports editing via a form, and updates workspace portfolio data.
frontend/src/pages/PortfoliosPage.tsx: Lists all portfolios with create and delete actions and provides a form for creating new portfolios.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays business report metrics and a sales items section, handling combined workspace and report queries.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Shows sales items with status filtering, table display, and empty-state handling for missing data.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionAnalytics: Displays subscription analytics with filtering, error handling, and admin access checks, rendering workspace subscription stats and tables.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Handles viewing and managing a workspace’s subscription, including starting trials, activating plans, and canceling subscriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash fragments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and fonts, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and definitions of existing and requested features for the AI business assistant system.
